techmeme.title: Sources: the European Commission is expected to find that Meta violated the DMA and fine the company hundreds of millions of dollars, possibly over $1B (Thomas Barrabi/New York Post)

OpenAI updates Advanced Voice Mode to make ChatGPT "more direct, engaging, concise, specific, and creative" for paying users, and interrupt all users less often (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Samsung says its co-CEO Han Jong-hee has died at 63 from cardiac arrest (Reuters)
The Atlantic EIC was accidentally added to a Signal group chat with Trump officials about war plans; Signal isn't approved for sharing classified information (Jeffrey Goldberg/The Atlantic)
